name: REG_ABST_ESIG_INSTANT
description: This table holds the instants each e-signature field was signed.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ESIGNATURE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Instant associated with a signature field
